sourcesContent:
<template v-if="users">
    <login-page
      :current-input: currentInput
      :check-user: checkUser
    ></login-page>
</template>
<script>
import LoginPage from "./components/LoginPage.vue";

export default {
    name: "App",
    data() {
        return {
            users: [],
            currentInput: {
              accountName: "",
              accountPassword: ""
            },
            userIndex: NaN
        };
    },
    created() {
      this.getPages();
    },
    components: {
        LoginPage,
    },
    methods: {
        async getPages() {
            let res = await fetch("users.json");
            let data = await res.json();

            this.users = data;
        },
        checkUser(name, pass) {
          users.forEach((user, index) => {
            if (user.email == name || user.phoneNumber == name) {
              if (pass == user.password)
              this.userIndex = index;
            }
          })
        }
    },
};
</script>
